title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Extension of various periods of 
operation) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 10th day of 

November 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (extension various period operation) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 10th day november 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) is 
amended, in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “9th day of January 2022” for 
“9th day of November 2021”.

heading: 3. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) (S.I. No. 244 of 
2020) Regulations 2020 is amended by the substitution of “9th day of February 
2022” for “9th day of November 2021”.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
4. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) is amended by the substitution of “9th 
day of February 2022” for “9th day of November 2021”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th November, 2021.

heading: 6. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
6. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 571 of 2020) is amended, in paragraph (2),

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 November, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(Extension of various periods of operation) Regulations 2021 

These regulations extend S.I 217 of 2021 (Section 31A-Temporary restrictions) 
to the 9th of January, 2022. They also extend the face coverings’ Regulations 
S.I 244 of 2020, S.I 296 of 2020, S.I 571 of 2020, and S.I. 569 of 2020 to the 
9th February, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 [585] 5
